title: Satellite insurance (launch, in-orbit, third-party liability)
dataVerified: Satellite owner/operator, launch details, in-orbit value, liability limits
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake satellite insurance. Domain binding verifies Lloyd's syndicate/space insurer. Extremely high values ($200M-$500M per satellite). Launch failure coverage. In-orbit degradation. Third-party liability (collision, debris). Long orbital lifetime.
